original_text: And Moses spake to the children of Israel, that they should bring forth him that had cursed out of the camp, and stone him with stones. And the children of Israel did as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 모세가 이스라엘 자손에게 말하니 그들이 그 저주한 자를 진영 밖으로 끌어내어 돌로 쳤더라 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Moses spake to the children of Israel,
that they should bring forth him that had cursed
sentences.korean_translation: 저주한 자를 진 밖으로 내어오게 하고

sentences.original_text: And the children of Israel did
